title: Illuvium Preview: Everything You Need to Know About the NFT Games
description: Illuvium is an NFT-powered sci-fi fantasy world with cards, creatures, and worlds to explore. Here's an introduction to its games.

title: Hopeful Bitcoin Enthusiasts Anticipate a ‘Santa Claus Rally’ Echoing Past Holiday Season Surges
description: As we near December, some bitcoin enthusiasts are buzzing with anticipation that a ‘Bitcoin Santa Claus rally’ might emerge this year, reminiscent of the surges in 2013 and 2017. This speculative notion suggests that bitcoin often performs exceptionally well during the December festive season, although this isn’t a consistent trend. Nevertheless, this hypothesized event is […]

title: Brad Garlinghouse challenges ex-SEC chief’s crypto views
description: In recent events, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse expressed his disbelief on a social media post regarding former U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Jay Clayton’s comments about cryptocurrency regulation. This reaction stems from Clayton’s latest statements at a Council on Foreign Relations event, where he displayed a supportive stance towards cryptocurrency entrepreneurs.  Brad Garlinghouse’s skepticism ... Read more

title: Cosmos Hub approves proposal to slash ATOM inflation
description: The Cosmos Hub community is giving the green light to a proposal aimed at reducing the maximum inflation rate of its native token, Cosmos (ATOM), from 14% to 10% as a security enhancement measure.
